title: "Death of a Salesman" Poster
description: Sepia photographic image of lower portion of the face and upper torso of a smiling man in a suit jacket and tie. Image broken up by horizontal shards of white. Text in oblique black band:"riding on a smile and a shoeshine"; at top margin:"THE NORA THEATRE COMPANY"; in lower section:"ARTHUR MILLER'S / DEATH OF A SALESMAN / JANUARY 6-29 / Directed by Eric Engel. . . "
name: Poster
